movies.title: Iron Man
movies.description: Tony Stark builds a high-tech suit of armor to fight injustice after escaping captivity.

movies.title: The Incredible Hulk
movies.description: Bruce Banner becomes the Hulk as he searches for a cure while on the run from the military.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.description: Tony Stark faces new enemies and government pressure as he continues his superhero journey.

movies.title: Thor
movies.description: Thor, the god of thunder, is banished to Earth and must prove himself worthy.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.description: Steve Rogers becomes Captain America to fight in WWII and face the Red Skull.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes team up to stop Loki and an alien invasion.

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.description: Tony Stark faces PTSD and a mysterious terrorist known as the Mandarin.

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.description: Thor must stop Malekith from plunging the universe into darkness.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.description: Captain America uncovers a conspiracy and faces a ghost from his past.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of misfits team up to protect a powerful orb from falling into the wrong hands.

movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movies.description: The Avengers must stop Ultron, an AI created by Tony Stark, from destroying humanity.

movies.title: Ant-Man
movies.description: Scott Lang becomes Ant-Man and must pull off a heist to save the world.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.description: The Avengers are divided over government oversight, leading to a major conflict.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: A surgeon becomes a sorcerer after a car accident leads him to the mystic arts.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movies.description: The Guardians unravel the mystery of Peter Quill’s parentage.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.description: Peter Parker balances high school life and being Spider-Man under Tony Stark’s guidance.

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.description: Thor must escape Sakaar and stop Ragnarok to save Asgard.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T’Challa returns to Wakanda to claim the throne but faces a powerful challenger.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.description: The Avengers unite to stop Thanos from collecting the Infinity Stones.

movies.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
movies.description: Ant-Man teams up with the Wasp to rescue someone lost in the quantum realm.

movies.title: Captain Marvel
movies.description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes during a galactic war.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers attempt to undo the damage caused by Thanos’ snap.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
movies.description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe, but trouble follows.

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts her past and faces a dangerous conspiracy.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: Shang-Chi must confront his father’s legacy and the secret of the Ten Rings.

movies.title: Eternals
movies.description: A group of ancient beings come out of hiding to protect Earth from a long-forgotten enemy.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Peter Parker faces the multiverse as past villains return from other worlds.

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
movies.description: Doctor Strange travels across realities to stop a dangerous multiverse threat.

movies.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
movies.description: Thor faces a powerful new enemy and reconnects with Jane Foster as Mighty Thor.

movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies.description: Wakanda mourns the loss of T’Challa and prepares to defend itself from new threats.
